summary: No more "ARGH MY EYES!" when using the slow time shout, or anything else that slows time, 100% guaranteed!
descriptionHtml:
No more "ARGH MY EYES!" when using the slow time shout, or anything else that slows time, 100% guaranteed!

To install:
> Unzip the archive
-> Copy the file "Cleaner Slowtime" into Skyrim's Data folder
--> Start "SkyrimLauncher"
---> Click on "Data Files" within the menu (this is important, because it loads the mod)
----| And now you are done.

Different mods that can be seen in the screenshots:
The clock -> http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/44091/?
The lantern -> http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17416/?
author: HakitoJin
